channel.title: Artworks on InfluxData Branding Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Artworks on InfluxData Branding Docs

item.title: Artwork
item.description: Widescreen Artwork For Web & Print Usage Rules Best used as backgrounds beneath text or other graphics Works well in Hero images on the website Ready to Use Images

item.title: Mascots
item.description: InfluxData Mascots We make use of animal mascots to add more personality to the brand. They are not the official representations of our products or The TICK Stack as a whole. The mascots are primarily used in promotional material such as stickers and merchandise. Each product has an associated animal that uses the same starting character (Except Chronograf). Telegraf Tiger InfluxDB I'iwi Chronograf Giraffe Kapacitor Koala Outreach Club Octopus Downloads Color + Transparent Background Product Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-24 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-24 400x295 Chronograf PNG-24 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-24 280x380 Color + White Background Product Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-8 / JPG 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-8 / JPG 400x295 Chronograf PNG-8 / JPG 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-8 / JPG 280x380

item.title: Photography
item.description: Gradient Mapped Photography Usage Rules Best used as backgrounds beneath text or other graphics Works well in Hero images on the website Ready to Use Images

item.title: Themes
item.description: Themes in Brand Imagery Photography Guidelines: Photography must always be gradient mapped using the Brand Neutrals Gradient map effect makes the photography easy to place type or graphics over Themes: Architecture - Minimalistic, organic forms are ideal. Focus on lines that extend beyond the frame as well as repeating patterns Water - Avoid high noise imagery (such as splashes). Best to use images that capture the fluidity of water San Francisco - Images of our HQ city's landmarks are acceptable Graphics + Photography Guidelines:
